title: Memphis.Day1.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
Hello, I don't think we've met
I'm Memphis. 
I'm glad to finally meet you
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
Likewise
[[....|Memphis.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Memphis.Day1.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
Hey, I'm emma

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
I'm Memphis
[[....|Memphis.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Memphis.Dialog.Resolve
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
Is there something else you want to talk about?
<<if $escape_active is true>>
[[Yeah I'm trying to escape|Memphis.AddToEscapeQuest]]
<<endif>>
[[Not really...|Memphis.EndDialog]]

title: Memphis.Day2.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>

title: Memphis.Day2.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
Hey Emma, how's it going.

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
It's going to shit

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
haha I hear that
why does the quota keep going up?
do they expect us to mine an infinite amount of crystals or something?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
I heard they increase it until the losses become more expensive than the gains
unfortunatly, I've heard this crystal is really valuable
what do they even use it for?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
It's for refining the ore that's being dug up on the other side of the compound
I'm not sure how the process works, but it adds strength to the metal alloy
or something

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
something huh
what do they use this fuckin steel for anyway

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
Warships or some shit

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
we're at the start of a long chain of misery and pain
[[....|Memphis.Dialog.Resolve]]

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>

title: Memphis.Day3.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
Hi Memphis

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
Hey Emma
Do you feel any satisfaction in a hard day's work?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
Honestly, I do. When we're down there in the mine fighting off bugs...
it makes me forget everything that's up here on the surface

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
Yeah, i feel that too, a little bit
It's messed up
I'm terrified of the mine, but, I almost have more control down there than up here

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
We can also kill the bugs

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
That too
[[....|Memphis.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Memphis.Day4.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
Hello, I don't think we've met
I'm Memphis.

title: Memphis.Day4.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
Memphis is a stupid name, your parents were stupid

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
they sold me into slavery to buy a boat so yes I agree
Was it a fishing boat?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
No like a yacht, a fucking yacht

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
what, that's the most insane thing I've ever heard
who sells their kid into slavery to buy a yacht

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
the same parents who name a kid Memphis

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
you ever think about changing your name?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
I can't really think of one, but yeah
I suppose if I escape again and I were to start a new life

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
who said anything about escaping?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
Uhhh, yeah
[[....|Memphis.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Memphis.Day5.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
Hello, I don't think we've met
I'm Memphis. 
I'm glad to finally meet you
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
Likewise
[[....|Memphis.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Memphis.Day5.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
What do you think they use these crystals for?
Besides refining metal, I mean

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
Hmm, well, certain people, like you, react to it and get special powers
but somehow it only happens underground
I hear they're using some crystals to make weapons but they haven't figured it out
most of the metal refined here goes into warships and such

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
Are "we" at war?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
I don't remember. There's the empire, which I guess counts as "Us"
And the Republic, which counts as "them"

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
What are they fighting over?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
I'm not sure, since from what I've been told, the Republic has slavery too

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
What? So there's no escaping this is there?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
Yeah, I don't know.
<<CampEventController upgradePickaxeLevel>>
[[....|Memphis.Dialog.Resolve]]

body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>

title: Memphis.Day6.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
So Memphis, that war we were talking about yesterday

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
It's not really a war
really what I think happens is both sides build warships just to see who's strongest
And neither side really fight
like there might be a proxy conflict, but that's it

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
So we're mining crystal to make steel
...so that they can build a bunch of useless warships
...so that our "side" has more than the other "side"
When does this end?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
I don't know.
I worried they'll get bored and want to use their armies
just to see who'd win
Of course if that happened, our lives would get a lot worse
[[....|Memphis.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Memphis.Day7.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
Hello, I don't think we've met
I'm Memphis. 
I'm glad to finally meet you
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
Likewise
[[....|Memphis.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Memphis.Day7.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
Emma, you keep asking me about the world
but I kinda wanna know about yours

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
I used to work on a farm, I grew up on a farm
really don't have much to offer you

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
Do you rabbits have, like, a religion or something?
I know that's a weird question

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
No not at all
We have this book of stories, supposed to teach us about the world

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
Yeah?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
Like there's one where there's a big disaster that's about to happen
like a huge dust storm

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
So do they pray to some god and they get saved?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
No what happens is they band together and make a shelter
a shelter out of ash, because the forest had also burned down
I think the lesson is, don't rely on a miracle and work together

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
Hrm, that's...unexpected

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
What were you expecting?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
Like, if you have impure thoughts, you'll die and suffer for all eternity

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
That sounds real fucked up

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
...Yeah
[[....|Memphis.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Memphis.Day8.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
Hello, I don't think we've met

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>

title: Memphis.Day8.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
Hi Memphis

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
Hi Emma

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
I hate mining so much
I hate the crystals, the bugs
going deeper and deeper into the caves to get even more crystals
mainly, I hate it when someone else gets hurt

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
Don't beat yourself up

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
Memphis, i'm the only person who can heal, or sense the crystals
or do anything, really
I feel like I'm no good at this
If I fuck up everyone else dies

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
Well, you aren't wrong

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
Do you feel like I'm not healing you enough?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
I can't say either way
I don't think anyone else begrudges you
If anything, you're caring for us more than anyone else right now

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
Really?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
Yeah
[[....|Memphis.Dialog.Resolve]]

<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>

title: Memphis.Day9.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
Emma why do we suffer so much

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
...
Memphis I'm tired
I really don't want to talk about feelings right now

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
... Okay

[[....|Memphis.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Memphis.Day10.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
Hello, I don't think we've met

<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>

title: Memphis.Day10.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
Memphis, since coming here do you feel like your dreams are different?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
No, can't say that I do

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
Mine have been really vivid
Sometimes it feels like I'm there
It doesn't even feel like a dream

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
What are they like?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
In one of them I'm standing over one of the guards
He's in his dorm room, or something
I'm just standing over him and he yells at me

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
Can you talk at all? In these dreams?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
No not really

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
What does the guard say?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
At first he was angry I was there
but with each subsequent visit, he seems to remember me, and has gone more and more defensive
to the point where I think he fears me

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
Have you seen this guard anywhere in the factory or around the mine?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_silent>>
No, I haven't

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer memphis_default_talking>>
Hm. Weird. 
[[....|Memphis.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Memphis.AddToEscapeQuest
body:
<<addNPCToEscape CampAreaSecretEscape Memphis>>
Escape? Here? You have a plan?
I'll help you, whatever it takes

title: Memphis.EndDialog
body: Empty Text
